channel.title: THM on Peter Lymo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in THM on Peter Lymo's Blog

item.title: Try Hack Me - IGNITE Writeup
item.description: Hi, There, I got free time to solve a easy box from try hack me, this box its actually easy one, it consist exploiting a content management system(CMS) so called fuelCMS which was vulnerable with code execution, and rooted with password reuse. recon nmap found one port,80 ┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~/thm/ignite] └─$ sudo nmap -p- --open -sV -A -n -Pn 10.10.138.76 [sudo] password for kali: Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-09-16 19:19 EAT Nmap scan report for 10.

item.title: Try Hack Me - IDE Writeup
item.description: Hi, There, I got a spare time to solve IDE box from try hack me, here is how i did it, this a easy box that help you with enumerations skills when doing penetration tests.lets see how to solve this easy box peacefully. Recon nmap got 4 ports, 21,22,80,62337 ┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~] └─$ sudo nmap -p- --open -sV -A -n -Pn 10.10.106.60 [sudo] password for kali: Starting Nmap 7.93 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-09-14 17:40 EAT Nmap scan report for 10.
